name: avagiance
description:
NB: you should really play the downloadable version, because things work properly

You are a demigod, but this doesn't mean you are imune to death, but you can work to delay that by stealing the life form evil creature. 

You have been summond to help your people, the people that belive and worship you.

Their world, Avagiance,  is dying, but there is an escape, you need to use your own energy to keep the portal open in order for them to escape, but the death of the planet is invitabile, so you need to be fast.

If you help them for long enough, maybe this hellish cycle will end and you will find a better place.

You move with wasd, use the sword with the left click and shoot a projectile with the right. whem you are in the blue circle around the portal, use your left click to donate enrgy to the portal and keep it open. you will have 45 second per stage to make all the people escape. let me know what you think and if you rate or leave a comment i will be very happy to try your game
